page.title: 03FARMS (2) _ KIRKNEWTON
page.content:
{KILHAM}
Kilham farm is owned by the inhabitants of the main house.
Kilham farm comprises 987.4 hec.This year 121.4 hec. of corn were sown,a farm record.The farm is known for its {Aberdeen Angus}bulls,of which there are 300.Most of the land is used for grazing the 2000 sheep.There are 1.6- 2.4 hec. woodland,a nature conservation reserve.The river running on one side of the farm is used for recreation.The disused railway on the property is used for winter fodder.
There are 12 households and 11 workers on the property.
